## FASTElement.$emit() method

Emits a custom HTML event.

**Signature:**

```typescript
$emit(type: string, detail?: any, options?: Omit<CustomEventInit, "detail">): boolean | void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

type


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The type name of the event.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

detail


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The event detail object to send with the event.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

Omit&lt;CustomEventInit, "detail"&gt;


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The event options. By default bubbles and composed.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean \| void

## Remarks

Only emits events if the element is connected.
